short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that generates a random password locally, doesn't beam your password over the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple password generating browser extension, made by request.

https://github.com/CalebBabin/password-gen-extension

Update: uses Crypto API instead of Random API to follow best practices
